queue.added: {gold}You have been added to the waiting queue.
queue.feedback: Please message {lightred}@easy.rs{gold} on Discord with any feedback.
help.line1: 1. You will begin in the bottom arena.
help.line2: 2. A win promotes you an arena.
help.line3: 3. A loss demotes you an arena.
help.line4: 4. Whoever has the most kills at the end of the round wins.
help.line5: 5. Whoever got the last kill wins in the event of a tie.
help.no_challenge: --- Challenging players is not supported yet.
help.no_guns: --- Selecting guns is not supported yet.
help.feedback: --- Please message {lightred}@easy.rs{default} on Discord with any feedback or bugs.
